SELECT info.info_board_code, info.info_board_title, u.user_nickname, info.info_board_like_cnt, info.info_board_view_cnt, info.info_board_reg_time FROM tb_info_board AS info INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON info.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY info_board_code DESC
LIMIT #{startRowNum}, #{rowPerPage};

SELECT u.user_nickname, info.info_board_code, info.info_board_title, info.info_board_content, info.info_board_like_cnt, info.info_board_view_cnt, info.info_board_reg_time, img.info_img FROM tb_info_board AS info INNER JOIN tb_info_board_img AS img ON img.info_board_code = info.info_board_code INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON info.user_id = u.user_id WHERE info.info_board_code = #{infoBoardCode};

SELECT u.user_nickname, comm.info_board_comment_code, comm.user_id, comm.info_board_comment_content, comm.info_board_comment_reg_time FROM tb_info_board AS info INNER JOIN tb_info_board_comment AS comm ON info.info_board_code = comm.info_board_code INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON comm.user_id = u.user_id WHERE comm.info_board_code = #{infoBoardCode};
